title: Mastery 6 Tokens
body: Rank s- or higher to earn a Mastery 6 token. Combine 2 tokens to advance further.  I have 11 guys at s- and higher but no tokens for a long time. The wording needs to change if we cannot get a Mastery 6 token in ARAM then that needs to be added to the wording. Because the way it reads to me is I should have a lot of tokens and a lot of guys at Mastery 6. But I have 21 at Mastery 5 because I have no tokens.

replies.body: You can only earn mastery tokens on SR normal and ranked matches.

> [{quoted}](name=TheLastShadow45,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=7UBo2msd,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-07-30T19:52:54.439+0000)
>
> You can only earn mastery tokens on SR normal and ranked matches.

Yes but it does not say that in the wording on the page though, It needs to be clarified.
I have shit loads of tokens, but no essence.. the essence is my problem. You can get tokens in aram, but you MUST be lvl 5 with the champion to get the tokens.

>  You can get tokens in aram

This is wrong, you can only earn tokens in normal and ranked SR matches. So no RGM, no ARAM and no TT.

Ahhhh sorry that you read the [**Champion Mastery**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284#h1q5) section incorrectly! I may need to see if I can get a little better wording on there for you. 

Essentially, to get Mastery 6 tokens you need to get S- or better in two SR matches with the champ. Then, take those 2 tokens and combine them with either blue essence or the champ shard/perm to level them up to Mastery 6. The same applies for Mastery 7, except you need 3 tokens by getting S or better.
